post:
FragReady.com is proud to announce that we are offering Virtual Private Servers in our Montreal, Canada location. At this location, we also offer DDoS Protection up to 1TB.

You can manage your service with the SolusVM Control Panel that we offer, which allows you to boot your machine, reboot, shutdown, reinstall, change root password, etc.

Here is the package we're offering:

**Intel E5 CPU

1024 MB Memory

100GB HD

Unlimited Bandwidth

1IP Address ** _only $7.00/mo _ Order here: http://my.fragready.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=100 (Be sure to use promo LET88 to receive the special $7/mo pricing.

Interested in a different plan? Take a look at our packages: http://fragready.com/virtual_dedicated_servers/virtual-dedicated-servers.php

---------

Dedicated Server Blow out Sale -- Chicago, Illinois ONLY!

**Dual Quad Harpertown L5420 2.5Ghz

8GB DDR2 ECC RAM

500GB SATA Hard Drive

5TB Transfer on 100Mbps Port

1 Usable IPv4**

$45.00/mo order here: http://my.fragready.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=89
